EmailTemplate.subject: WINNERS WINNERS WINNERS!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi everyone!
Thank you for all your amazing NCS stories told in a creative way!
The overall winner of the competition, from entries spanning across Surrey, Buckinghamshire and Berkshire....
is...
*drum roll*
JESSICA HUDSON with her amazing drawing called "The Future is in Our Hands!
You win a Beats pill or Â£100 Love2Shop vouchers!!!!
We also had two runners up from Buckinghamshire and Berkshire who will be contacted soon!
Thank you all for your amazing entries and keep an eye out for the next competition!
In the meantime- don't forget to apply to be Associate Mentors! Just fill in this application form to join us for NCS 2016 as a volunteer:-
http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=2bbhwytrbxr8v
Please do this as soon as you can if you want to be involved!
Thanks so much and have a lovely weekend everyone!
Amy
